Enums/VeniceError.html#/s:FO6Venice11Ven.name: canceled
Enums/VeniceError.html#/s:FO6Venice11Ven.abstract: Thrown when the operation is performed on a closed handle.

Enums/VeniceError.html#/s:FO6Venice11Ven.name: operationNotSupported
Enums/VeniceError.html#/s:FO6Venice11Ven.abstract: Thrown when the operation is not supported.

Enums/VeniceError.html#/s:FO6Venice11Ven.name: invalidHandle
Enums/VeniceError.html#/s:FO6Venice11Ven.abstract: Thrown when the operation is performed on an invalid handle.

Enums/VeniceError.html#/s:FO6Venice11Ven.name: invalidFileDescriptor
Enums/VeniceError.html#/s:FO6Venice11Ven.abstract: Thrown when the operation is performed on an invalid file descriptor.

Enums/VeniceError.html#/s:FO6Venice11Ven.name: fileDescriptorBlockedInAnotherCoroutine
Enums/VeniceError.html#/s:FO6Venice11Ven.abstract: Thrown when another coroutine is already blocked on poll with this file descriptor.

Enums/VeniceError.html#/s:FO6Venice11Ven.name: deadlineReached
Enums/VeniceError.html#/s:FO6Venice11Ven.abstract: Thrown when the operation reaches the deadline.

Enums/VeniceError.html#/s:FO6Venice11Ven.name: outOfMemory
Enums/VeniceError.html#/s:FO6Venice11Ven.abstract: Thrown when the system doesn’t have enough memory to perform the operation.

Enums/VeniceError.html#/s:FO6Venice11Ven.name: handleIsDone
Enums/VeniceError.html#/s:FO6Venice11Ven.abstract: Thrown when the operation is performed on an done handle.

Enums/VeniceError.html#/s:FO6Venice11Ven.name: brokenConnection
Enums/VeniceError.html#/s:FO6Venice11Ven.abstract: Thrown when the operation is performed on a broken connection.

Enums/VeniceError.html#/s:FO6Venice11Ven.name: closedConnection
Enums/VeniceError.html#/s:FO6Venice11Ven.abstract: Thrown when the operation is performed on a closed connection.

Enums/VeniceError.html#/s:FO6Venice11Ven.name: invalidArguments
Enums/VeniceError.html#/s:FO6Venice11Ven.abstract: Thrown when the operation is performed with invalid arguments.

Structs/Deadline.html#/s:ZvV6Venice8Dead.name: immediately
Structs/Deadline.html#/s:ZvV6Venice8Dead.abstract: Special value to be used if the operation needs to be performed without blocking.

Structs/Deadline.html#/s:ZvV6Venice8Dead.name: never
Structs/Deadline.html#/s:ZvV6Venice8Dead.abstract: Special value to be used to allow the operation to block forever if needed.
